name: San Francisco and Marin Alcoholics Anonymous
description: The Intercounty Fellowship of Alcoholics Anonymous in San Francisco and Marin is a fellowship of people who share their experience, strength and hope with each other that they may solve their common problem and help others to recover from alcoholism.
fullDescription: The Intercounty Fellowship of Alcoholics Anonymous in San Francisco and Marin is a fellowship of people who share their experience, strength and hope with each other that they may solve their common problem and help others to recover from alcoholism.
